item.title: A Leader’s Age is More Than a Number. Treat it Strategically in Family Business
item.description: In family enterprises, a proactive approach to age and retirement is critical.

item.title: What 18 Years in Toastmasters Taught Me About Leadership That No MBA Could
item.description: Toastmasters helps people with public speaking, but this hidden benefit is even more important for today’s business leaders.

item.title: ‘Shark Tank’ Star Daniel Lubetzky Delivered a UC Berkeley Commencement on the Four Superpowers of Youth
item.description: Youth is a mindset. When deployed in business, watch as it transforms the world around you.

item.title: Pyx Health Acquires FarmboxRx as Nutrition Startups Heat Up in MAHA America
item.description: The two female-founded businesses address non-medical barriers to better health. The combined firm could see a boost under RFK Jr.’s HHS.
